title: La Libreria de los Escritores – Astrid Stavro studio – which script font?
author: yepski

comments.content:
Century 725 (roman and italic) seems to be a decent match:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/century-725/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153849/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/century-725/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/century-725/")
This feels very close indeed! I think New Century Schoolbook is an even better match. Thank you so much kthomps5 for putting me in this direction!

Yepski, New Century Schoolbook may do in a pinch, but it is not a match to your sample (especially evident when you look at the italic). Your sample is pretty low-res, but I'm fairly sure it’s Century 725:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153849im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NewCenturySchoolbook_5221.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153849im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Century725_3520.png)
